name: slurpee
description: One of Winnipeg's famed iced cola beverages.

name: hamburger
description: Two buns past their prime cradle a wad of what you hope is animal meat.

name: first aid kit
description: A small pack of sundry items that somehow allow the user to heal serious wounds in the heat of combat.

name: full syringe
description: A syringe full of neon-coloured liquid.

name: shovel
description: A sturdy shovel. Could be used to dig a grave, if you’re into that.

name: recurve bow
description: A well-worn but serviceable bow, and an ample quiver of sturdy arrows that can be recovered after battle.

name: knife
description: A poorly made but otherwise usable knife. May be thrust through lighter armours.

name: scout’s note
description: A map of Assiniboine forest with a perimeter marked. You suspect something important can be found within it.

name: octocopter
description: A small battered octocopter drone outfitted with what look like a pair of nail guns. Perhaps some useful information can be extracted from it. Or it could be hurled at somebody in a pinch.
